name: Anomiac.
summary:
“Anomiac.” is an exploration game about a little girl whose ability to communicate has been impaired due to having a stoke. Through dreaming, she experiences a vibrant, colorful, crazy world where she feels uninhibited and is able to experience the things she can’t while awake.

“Anomiac.” was developed for the Dream Diary Jam 2 by Kip Icon Games using RPG Maker MV.
